title: Relaxing Instrument Exogeneity with Common Confounders. (arXiv:2301.02052v2 [econ.EM] UPDATED)
abstract: Instruments can be used to identify causal effects in the presence of unobserved confounding, under the famous relevance and exogeneity (unconfoundedness and exclusion) assumptions. As exogeneity is difficult to justify and to some degree untestable, it often invites criticism in applications. Hoping to alleviate this problem, we propose a novel identification approach, which relaxes traditional IV exogeneity to exogeneity conditional on some unobserved common confounders. We assume there exist some relevant proxies for the unobserved common confounders. Unlike typical proxies, our proxies can have a direct effect on the endogenous regressor and the outcome. We provide point identification results with a linearly separable outcome model in the disturbance, and alternatively with strict monotonicity in the first stage. translated_title: 通过共同混淆因素放松工具的外生性
translated_abstract: 工具变量可用于在存在未观测混淆的情况下确定因果效应，在著名的相关性和外生性（无混淆与排除）假设下。由于外生性难以证明并且在某种程度上是不可测试的，因此它经常受到应用中的批评。为了缓解这个问题，我们提出了一种新的识别方法，它将传统的工具变量外生性放松为在一些未观测共同混淆因素条件下的外生性。我们假设存在一些未观测共同混淆因素的相关代理。与典型代理不同，我们的代理可以直接影响内生回归器和结果。我们在干扰中提供了线性可分离的结果模型的定点识别结果，或者在第一阶段具有严格单调性的情况下提供了定点识别结果。我们连续推导了通用的双重稳健和Neyman正交矩，以便尽管高维参数，也能进行直接的根-n估计。
tldr: 本文提出了一种新的工具变量识别方法，将常规的外生性放松为在一些未观测共同混淆因素条件下的外生性。作者提出代理可以直接影响内生回归器和结果。
en_tdlr: This paper proposes a novel approach to instrument identification that relaxes traditional exogeneity assumptions by considering exogeneity conditional on unobserved common confounders. The paper introduces relevant proxies for these confounders, which may directly affect the endogenous regressor and outcome.
